title: Abbey Clancy shows off her ‘peachy’ bum as she dons swimsuit on beach break
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Abbey Clancy has left fans drooling after showing off her pert bottom in an Instagram post, captioning the cheeky snap: “Life’s a peach”.

The 33-year-old, who has four kids, showed off her enviable derriere as she lounged on a beach on yet another exotic break.

The model, who is married to footballer Peter Crouch, perched on the edge of a sun lounger in a white swimsuit, posing with her back to the camera.

In a separate post in the same outfit, Abbey posed in front of palm trees, captioning the snaps with palm tree and sun emojis.

(Image: Instagram)

Both saucy snaps were met with floods of praise, with Abbey’s sister Elle leading the comments with multiple fire emojis.

Ex-Page 3 model Keeley Hazell added a peach emoji, representing Abbey’s bottom, while WAG Lizzie Cundy wrote “Beauty” with a pink heart emoji.

Abbey gave birth to her fourth child, a son named Jack, in June this year.

She and husband Peter, who she married in 2011, are also parents to daughters Sophia Ruby and Liberty Rose and son Johnny.

(Image: Instagram)

The beauty recently admitted that Johnny was her favourite child, saying: “He’s the prince! Yes, he’s still the favourite and he’s definitely a mummy’s boy.

"Johnny’s just gorgeous, he’s really gentle and loving. He’s always cuddling and kissing me."

description: The 33-year-old mum-of-four sent fans wild after posed for the saucy snaps in a white lace-up swimsuit
